description: Step-by-step instructions on how to cook biriyani

Preparing the Rice.description: Instructions on how to prepare the rice for biriyani
subtopics: Wash and rinse the rice
Soak the rice in water for 30 minutes
Drain the water from the soaked rice

Marinating the Meat.description: Instructions on how to marinate the meat for biriyani
subtopics: Clean and wash the meat
In a bowl, mix together yogurt, spices, and meat
Cover and refrigerate for at least 1 hour

Preparing the Biriyani Masala.description: Instructions on how to prepare the biriyani masala
subtopics: In a pan, heat oil and add whole spices
Add chopped onions and cook until golden brown
Add ginger-garlic paste and sauté for a minute
Add chopped tomatoes and cook until softened
Add spices and mix well
Cook the masala until oil separates from it

Cooking the Meat and Rice.description: Instructions on how to cook the meat and rice together
subtopics: In a separate large pan, heat oil and add the marinated meat
Cook the meat until it is browned and tender
In a large pot, bring water to a boil
Add the soaked and drained rice to the boiling water
Cook the rice until it is 70% cooked
Drain the partially cooked rice

Layering and Dum Cooking.description: Instructions on how to layer and cook biriyani in dum style
subtopics: In a large pot, add a layer of partially cooked rice
Spread a layer of cooked meat masala on top of the rice
Repeat the layer with rice and meat masala
Cover the pot with a tight-fitting lid
Place the pot on a low flame and seal the edges with wheat dough to create a dum
Cook the biriyani on low flame for 20-25 minutes
Remove from heat and let it rest for 5-10 minutes
Gently mix the layers before serving

Garnishing and Serving.description: Instructions on how to garnish and serve biriyani
subtopics: Garnish with fried onions, mint leaves, and coriander leaves
Serve hot with raita and salad on the side
